summary: Meditation app UI polish: adjust pre-meditation layout and in-session controls to better match the app’s theme.

existing_features.title: On the pre-meditation setup view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "setup"), move the "More Details" button so it is centered at the bottom of the meditation guide container (not positioned at the top-right).

On the in-session meditation view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "active"), increase the size of the two standard slider control containers (volume and time/seek) so they are easier to use (e.g., larger container height and/or padding) while keeping them as standard slider inputs and preserving their current behavior.

On the in-session meditation view (PreMeditationPage when phase is "active"), restyle the play/pause button so it better matches the app’s existing theme and also adjust its sizing/shape (not just colors).

new_feature_requests.summary: Move 'More Details' button to centered bottom of the guide container on the pre-meditation page.
Increase size/padding of in-session volume and time standard sliders to improve usability while keeping slider inputs.
Restyle and resize/reshape the play/pause button to better match the app’s theme.

projectName: Pre-meditation UI polish: move More Details button, enlarge sliders, and restyle play/pause
